channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Marketplace
channel.desc: Investigating the murky world of home heating deals to reveal how consumers who sign up for savings are getting surprises instead, locked into loans that come with broken promises of rebates, energy savings and free service.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Still Standing
channel.desc: While its tourist train dollars are long gone, the proudly-weird town of Wakefield is reimagining itself as a place known for culture and outdoor fun.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Land and Sea
channel.desc: For the first time since 1999, Canada's largest stamp collection exhibition makes a return to the Maritimes; meeting the people who passionately collect stamps, and the stories they hold.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Planet Wonder
channel.desc: Delving into the science of tree communication and the human relationship with trees.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Othello
channel.desc: Othello and Desdemona defy prejudice to be united in marriage, but deadly malice lurks where the newlyweds least expect it; the man Othello trusts the most resolves to destroy their happiness at any cost.
